word: It was needful that there should be those who would speak out against that which was wrong, for God would cleanse the publishing house from plans of injustice and fraudulent dealings, even as the Saviour cleansed the temple from its moral pollution. I was shown that schemes would be made to deprive men of their rights; but such plans were not after Christ's order, but after the order of Satan. My guide said, "I have warned you. Speak my word fearlessly, whether men will hear, or whether they will forbear."
